item.description: hi, i’m josh i like to build and break things on the internet. some of my public work can be found below; ransomwatch - the open ransomware claim tracker transl8 - a x-platform query DSL for network search engines bebop - a framework for de-anonymising Tor and reverse proxy hosts multisocks - a scaling relay overlay for tor traffic balancing securitytools - a curated set of projects for security investigations kerchow - my swiss army-knife terminal extension binfile collection urlgen - a search engine overlay for OSINT investigators honeypots - a handful of frontends to commonly abused services statuspage - the underground statuspage you can find me on x & github or by mailing josh@atdotcomdotcomdot.
